TopicTitle: No thread ratings in General Discussion?

Articles.Content: Is there any reason that threads cannot be rated in the General Discussion subforum? Seems odd not to permit it there (or anywhere on the forum, really).

I think the same but anyway, seeing how thread rating is really badly use in mod forums (people think it is used to rate the mod itself ), I don't know what is better: remove this entirely or putting it everywhere.
I barely ever use thread ratings, they're not obvious or particularly relevant to me...
I think they're pretty pointless, they don't work as-is anyway.

thread rating is really badly use in mod forums (people think it is used to rate the mod itself )

Huh, I've been doing it wrong. I look at thread rating of a mod release thread as a rating of the mod, not a rating of the discussion of that mod. Similarly, in Suggestions & Discussion, I look at the thread rating as a rating of the suggestion, not the resulting discussion.
